lu.uni.geko.resources
Class MainResourceLoader

java.lang.Object
  lu.uni.geko.resources.MainResourceLoader

public final class MainResourceLoader
extends Object

A utility class to access the functionality provided by extensions of the SimpleResourceLoaderExt and RefinedResourceLoaderExt extension points.

See Also:
SimpleResourceLoaderExt, RefinedResourceLoaderExt, ResourceLoader

Field Summary
private static Map<String,RefinedResourceLoaderExt> fileExt2ResourceLoaderMap
          The mapping from file extensions to responsible resource loaders.

          Utility classes should not have a public or default constructor.

private static RefinedResourceLoaderExt getResourceLoaderForURI(org.eclipse.emf.common.util.URI uri)
Determines the resource loader that is responsible for loading the model at the given URI and returns it.

Returns:
the responsible resource loader

Returns:
an all contents iterator

getUniqueContentRoot

public static org.eclipse.emf.ecore.EObject getUniqueContentRoot(org.eclipse.emf.common.util.URI uri,
                                                                 String modelName)
Returns the root element of the content of the model at the given URI if it is unique (exactly one root element).

Parameters:
uri - the URI of the model to be loaded
modelName - the name of the model (for logging and error output)
Returns:
the root element

getUniqueContentRootIfCorrectlyTyped

public static <T extends org.eclipse.emf.ecore.EObject> T getUniqueContentRootIfCorrectlyTyped(org.eclipse.emf.common.util.URI uri,
                                                                                               String modelName,
                                                                                               Class<T> rootElementClass)
Returns the root element of the content of the model at the given URI if it is unique (exactly one root element) and has the type of the given class.

Type Parameters:
T - the type of the root element
Parameters:
uri - the URI of the model to be loaded
modelName - the name of the model (for logging and error output)
rootElementClass - the class of which the root element has to be an instance of
Returns:
the root element

                                            org.eclipse.emf.common.util.URI uri)
Saves the given EObjects as the only content of the model at the given URI.

Parameters:
eObject - the new root element
uri - the URI of the model to be replaced or created
